sentences.en: A smile suddenly animated her face.
sentences.cn: 她嫣然一笑，立显容光焕发。

sentences.en: A statesman should be animated by lofty sentiments.
sentences.cn: 政治家应当焕发出崇高的情操.

sentences.en: Carrie could not help listening with amusement to his animated descriptions.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉对于他的生动描绘不禁听得津津有味.

sentences.en: Disney has returned to what it does best: making full-length animated feature films.
sentences.cn: 迪斯尼又回到了它最擅长的领域：制作动画长片。
每个人都变得更加活泼热情。

sentences.en: He became animated and talkative after two drinks.
sentences.cn: 他一饮酒就变得兴奋,话也多起来了.

sentences.en: Her hand movements are becoming more animated.
sentences.cn: 她双手舞动得越发欢快了。

sentences.en: Her present submission is animated solely by her fear of punishment.
sentences.cn: 她目前的屈从完全是因为她害怕受罚.

sentences.en: His observations gave rise to an animated and lively discussion.
sentences.cn: 他的言论引起了一场气氛热烈而活跃的讨论.

sentences.en: I gazed in happy surprise at his animated expression.
sentences.cn: 我惊喜地望着他那副眉飞色舞的神情.

sentences.en: It was strange to see these Prague streets, usually so animated, now completely empty and deserted.
sentences.cn: 看到通常很有生气的布拉格的街道现在变得空无一人,真是很怪.
笑使他脸上增添了生气.

sentences.en: She was seen in animated conversation with the singer Yuri Marusin.
sentences.cn: 有人看见她与歌手尤里·马鲁辛交谈甚欢。

sentences.en: The boy was so bright and animated.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩活泼开朗，充满活力。

sentences.en: We had an animated discussion over current events last evening.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上我们热烈地讨论时事.

words.tran_cn: 活泼，生气；激励；卡通片绘制
鼓舞者；赋与生气者；卡通片绘制者（等于animater）
赋予生命（animate的过去式和过去分词）
使有生气；使活泼；鼓舞；推动

phrases.tran_cn: 动画片；动画电影；美术片
单格动画图形；动画图形，活动图像

trans.tran_cn: 活泼的，生气勃勃的，动画的
trans.tran_en: showing a lot of interest and energy
